future value. This contract then collects vested tokens from the fNFTs over time, allowing vS holders to redeem them for the underlying asset.","errors":{"EnforcedPause()":[{"details":"The operation failed because the contract is paused."}],"ExpectedPause()":[{"details":"The operation failed because the contract is not paused."}],"OwnableInvalidOwner(address)":[{"details":"The owner is not a valid owner account. claimVested(uint256,uint256).details: This is a public function that should be called periodically by keepers. The vault has delegation rights and tokens are sent directly to the vault.

params.count: The number of NFTs to process in this batch.
params.startIndex: The starting index in the heldNFTs array to process.

params._protocolTreasury: The address that receives protocol fees.
params._underlyingToken: The address of the underlying asset being vested (e.g., SONIC).
params._vsToken: The address of the vS token contract.

deposit(uint256).details: This is a ONE-WAY operation. User must delegate claiming rights first. The vault becomes the permanent beneficiary and will claim all future value.

params.nftId: The ID of the Sonic NFT to deposit.

emergencyMint(address,uint256).details: Emergency mint function for bootstrap liquidity Only callable by owner before protocol goes live

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

redeem(uint256).details: This actively claims from fNFTs when needed to provide redemption value, ensuring liquidity is always available based on actual vested amounts.

params.amount: The amount of vS tokens to burn.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setNFTContract(address).details: Can only be called once by the owner. This is a critical security step to ensure the vault only ever interacts with a verified, audited fNFT contract.

params._sonicNFT: The address of the Sonic vesting NFT contract.

simpleRedeem(uint256).details: Much cheaper gas option - only redeems from tokens already in vault

params.amount: The amount of vS tokens to burn.

totalAssets().details: The total amount of redeemable assets held by the vault.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

claimVested(uint256,uint256).notice: Claims currently vested tokens from deposited NFTs.

deposit(uint256).notice: Deposits an fNFT and mints vS tokens for its full future value.

pause().notice: Emergency pause function for the owner

redeem(uint256).notice: Burns vS tokens to redeem value by claiming from fNFTs proportionally.

setNFTContract(address).notice: Sets the official fNFT contract address.

simpleRedeem(uint256).notice: Simple redeem that only uses already-claimed tokens (LOW GAS)
